content: Ah, once your house is built, that thing from Loomi Co. will be ready, and then you'll be able to receive gifts anytime!
info: 共建箱材料-格连_主流程文本

content: But I can carry cargo boxes way bigger than me... <style=SizeSmall>Wait... How's that possible?</style>
info: 共建箱材料-格连_主流程文本

content: The <style=Highlight>mattock</style>—it's a powerful tool! Powerful and heavy... <style=SizeSmall>I—I can't even swing it.</style>
